lines.text:
[as an Alien readies the Rectal Probe]
Can we talk this over? It looks like you're going to sing White Christmas...

[Doppleganger scene]
I am you. And you are me. And we are here. I am the dreamer and you are the dream.
Is that someone there?
Where are you going?
I'm going out for some cigarettes.
You don't smoke.
Was there an owl in here last night?
Oh, these crazy women.
You've broken my mind.
Crack the whip! Drive the slaves off to another cocktail party. Make them babble about Glasnost, I've lost another day here!

You think I don't know what you do? If it's not the Crystal in the Sky, you're flying around the room! Little people, and some of them are blue. This is such bad material it's MAGAZINE writing! So who's been working on your stuff? You get to a certain age and blah, blah, blah? You know what I think? I think you're laughing to my face.

[Disturbed under hypnosis]
I CAN'T GET OUT OF THIS!
You know what he's doing in there? The old Romanian turn-on! Ze spirits ov ze vulfs!
And she's like this!
[snores]

[as her son sulks in the playground]
. He won't talk to me, I'm a girl!
It's a 23!
[False alarm]
You'll get your summons in the mail. Let your wife cook!

[Under hypnosis]
The world is blowing up. My son is dead.
Take us HOME Whitley!
You do not have temporal lobe epilepsy.

[Asking about God]
So we're all alone except for the little blue doctors? Can I dream Dad's dream?
The world is getting so small, it would be nice to meet someone new!
There are many faces of God, Masks of God. It scared me, because you went so far away from me. They gave you a gift. You'd better use it.
It's been an Ice Age. I've missed you. The old Ball and Chain.
I don't want to be crazy.
Then there's the other thing. The rectal thing.
Well it happens, you know? Even to men.
You know, you used to be funny.
You are not going to let us see you. That's a good idea.
I overreacted.
You were frightened by a Halloween Mask?
Yes.
A Halloween Mask frightened you?
Is there an echo? Yes.
We have to make this experience work for us.

There are wolves in the closet, wolves in the basement, wolves all over the place. They work in advertising. They sell junk food and beer. They eat gigantic hamburgers and they drink cold beers with the baseball games and the TV and the bags of the potato chips that are big enough to feed a horse. They have a lot of fun. They go to baseball games, they have a heck of a good time.
Am I not gorgeous?
You're dressed like for your first Communion.
What do I call a book about you?

[Doppleganger]
It is a puzzle box. And you're not going to get to see what's inside. Let's just get that clear.
It was like I'd seen it before. Alive...
Look at me, I'm naked! I'm talking to you like you're real. Go to Hell!

[after Whitley's final encounter]
They invited me to come with them. I had the feeling forever. Then it was morning.
They asked you to go away with them?
Yeah... I just came home to get my stuff.
[They start to laugh]
When the doctor hypnotized me, I was supposed to remember prowlers, or something, but in fact, I recall something else. I sure do.
What?

[Holds a hand about three feet above the floor]
Little blue f**kers, about that big.
You've broken my mind.

That's not it. I didn't come all this way for you to tell me that that's what it is. Is there something under that because I don't believe that one. It's like a box, a chinese box. You open it and there's another one inside and another one inside, another one inside... You're not gonna let me see you are you?
I can't wake up.
Awful... Terrible.
What's terrible?
What they did to me.
Now go forward to later that night. Go forward. What happens?
I'm checking out the house.
Why?
In case there might be somebody there, hiding.
Who?
Those things, people.
Did you know about those people then?
Sure.
Did you tell anyone?
I wasn't supposed to.
Put your grey pants on, elephants are grey.

[Playing with the elasticated trunk]
Is this the front or the back?
I don't need this. Bad dreams.
He's sending me to a shrinker who specialises in, believe it or not, rape cases.
Well, good.
It's okay.
Yes. But if I was in my...
[whispers]
right mind...
[normal voice]
I would know that too.
You go and see her, she's a professional, her evidence is accepted in court! We have a good home and I'm a good woman! You go and see her or we won't have any marriage left!
At least you two have each other. My husband did not have the experience, and he tried to have me committed.

[Walking in the snow]
Why are we sad?
Andy, what a thing to say.
Well, Dad's sad.
This new book, I'm under a lot of pressure...

[Crying]
Excuse me, I'm lost, can you tell me if this bus goes to the end of the line?

[Shrugs, moves away. Suddenly sees everyone on the bus as an alien. Pushes his way off the bus]
Let me tell you, you folks are in for a big surprise, one very big surprise.
I don't believe this. It's an ambush!
What a day, what a day, what a shmeer...
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with a writer being here.
Whitley's not here because he's a writer, he's here for the same reason you are.

[hypnotised]
I don't think I like this.

[listening to haiku]
That's a lot of pictures for a few words.
I have one child, I don't need another.

[should Andrew be hypnotised]
He's too young.
I found him!
I wonder if there are ghosts.
The house is new.
I mean the ghosts of the wolves. Grrr!
Stop it!
Remember, no tricks, only treats!
Are you old?
I see a light go by the window. But I don't want to think about that!
